issue.title: [CF 200] latest update broke TMW
issue.body:
Submitted Via

Curse Client 4.0.1.104, Microsoft Windows NT 6.1.7600.0

Installed Version

4.1.4.1

Description

Update 4.1.4.1 broke Tellmewhen. Doesn't appear anymore. /tmw doesn't work. Interface menu for tellmewhen shows blank.

Steps to Reproduce

Happened as soon as addon was updated via curse client. /reloading did not work ingame.

Installed Addons

_NPCScan - _NPCScan 4.1.0.1 Ace3 - Release-r1025 Addon Control Panel - 3.3.14 Atlasloot Enhanced - v6.03.02 AutoCombatLog - 1.0 Bagnon - 2.18.0 BigWigs Bossmods - r8352-release Blood Shield Tracker - 0.8 ButtonFacade: Apathy - 4.0.80 Chatter - v.1.3.1 CLC DK - 4.0.6d clcInfo - v.1.4.10.001 CurseProfiler 2.0 - v47 Deadly Boss Mods - Deadly Boss Mods 4.82-r5726 Deadly Boss Mods - WotLK, BC and Vanilla mods - DBM-v4-r308-Old Content Mods dG Killshot - 4.0.0.131 Dominos - 1.25.0 Enraged - Warrior DPS Helper - Beta 4.0.6a r9 Gladius - v2.0.16-beta Magic Runes - 1.0.82 Masque - 4.0.340 MikScrollingBattleText - v5.5.100 MoveAnything - 12.1.5 OmniCC - 4.1.pancakes6 PitBull Unit Frames 4.0 - v4.0.0-beta25 Postal - v3.4.7 Power Auras Classic - 4.20 Quartz - 3.0.6 Rare Spawn Overlay - Rare Spawn Overlay 4.2.40000 Skada Damage Meter - 1.2-32 TellMeWhen - 4.1.4.1 Tidy Plates - 6.2 TimeToDie - v1.3 TinyMeleeStats - 1.3.2 Tipsy - v4.0.1-release


> Posted by CurseForge user Fredgeot | Imported from CurseForge issue #200 | Raw
